virtual-sensor.name: Thur_DozerDecagonMux_pos1_chart2
virtual-sensor.description: Dozer messages (DozerDecagonMuxMsg) information from Thur deployment

address.predicate: select GENERATIONTIME, PAYLOAD_DATA_DIELECTRIC0, PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID0, PAYLOAD_DATA_DIELECTRIC1, PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID1, PAYLOAD_DATA_DIELECTRIC2, PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID2, PAYLOAD_DATA_DIELECTRIC3, PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID3, PAYLOAD_DATA_DIELECTRIC4, PAYLOAD_MUX_VALID4 from Thur_DozerDecagonMux_mapped_1396 where POSITION = 1 and PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID = 1
